products.title: Yeezy 500 'Stone Salt'
products.description: The adidas Yeezy 500 'Stone Salt' brings an airy grey mesh upper with contrast overlays made with a mix of sultry leather and cow suede. Reflective piping accents aid visibility in low-light conditions, while a padded collar and Ortholite insoles combine for a plush all-around feel. An abrasion-resistant rubber wrap pairs with an adiPRENE+ midsole that has pods on the outsole modeled after Feet You Wear technology.

products.title: Samba OG 'White Black Gum'
products.description: The adidas Samba OG is a modern version of a classic style. This 'Cloud White' version has a leather upper with suede on the contrast heel panel, the T-toe, and the iconic serrated three-stripes. Retro touches include bluebird and foil logos. Underfoot, the low top rests on a gum rubber outsole with a tread pattern ideal for multi-directional movement.

products.title: Jordan 4 Retro 'Black Cat' 2025
products.description: The 2025 version of the Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Black Cat' brings back the classic foam midsole paired with a visible Nike Air heel unit. Loyal to the 2006 design, these kicks have a black nubuck upper tooled with a quarter panel netting, molded eyelets and anchor wings. A matching Jumpman lands on the tongue tag and heel tab.

products.title: Wmns Jordan 4 Retro 'Orchid'
products.description: The Women's Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Orchid' rolls out a lilac-colored suede upper with a visible side netting and grey molded eyelets. Speckled details adorn the support wings and molded back tab, adorned with the Jumpman logo, much like the foam midsole. Encapsulated Air-sole cushioning rests in the forefoot, while the heel equips an exposed Air bag for a soft feel underfoot.

products.title: Yeezy Boost 350 V2 'Onyx'
products.description: A monochromatic 'Onyx' hue envelops the latest Yeezy Boost 350 V2, the lifestyle runner from adidas and Kanye West. The upper features a dark black Primeknit weave along with rope laces, while a post-dyed monofilament side stripe can be found in a lighter black shade. A full-length Boost unit is encapsulated in a semi-translucent ribbed TPU midsole, while a black rubber outsole rounds out the look.

products.title: Wmns Air Max 95 OG 'Blue Tint' 2025
products.description: The 2025 version of the Nike Women's Air Max 95 OG 'Blue Tint' has side panels made with rippling layers of synthetic suede done up in a grey gradient. Pastel blue touches decorated the webbed lace loops, as well as the logo on the Max Air unit bolstering the foam midsole.

products.title: Jordan 11 Retro 'Rare Air'
products.description: The Air Jordan 11 Retro 'Rare Air' is inspired by the imperfections found on early Air Jordan samples. These shoes have a white leather upper with a shiny blue patent leather mudguard. A red Jumpman logo adorns the side, while 'Jordan' is spelled out through each of the webbed eyelets, and a stylized '23' signoff lands on the back tab. The Phylon midsole works in tandem with a full-length Air-sole unit and a see-through rubber outsole.

products.title: Jordan 4 Retro OG GS 'White Cement' 2025
products.description: The Air Jordan 4 Retro OG GS 'White Cement' 2025 sports white leather on the upper and the unmistakable quarter panel netting to go with black molded eyelets. A red Jumpman logo lands on the Flight tongue tag, while the Nike Air logo adorns the grey speckled heel tab. That same finish can be seen on the wings and on part of the foam midsole, fitted with an Air-sole heel unit. The rubber outsole has a herringbone traction pattern for smooth grip.

products.title: Zoom Kobe 6 GS 'Dodgers'
products.description: The Nike Zoom Kobe 6 GS 'Dodgers' rocks a royal blue micromesh upper, using foam 'islands' that constitute an eye-catching snakeskin texture. Red baseball-style stitching on the tongue makes way for Kobe Bryant's 3D sheath logo, matching the white Swoosh on the side and the heel counter. A red '8' signs off on the heel as a nod to the Hall of Famer. These shoes have a full-length Cushlon midsole bolstered with a Zoom Air forefoot unit for a plush feel.

products.title: Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids 'Bone'
products.description: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids 'Bone' has an off-white Primeknit upper highlighted by distinctive center stitching and a post-dyed monofilament side stripe. No-tie elastic laces and a pull tab at the heel make on and off a breeze. The Yeezy logo adorns the insoles for a signature look. A full-length Boost midsole is engulfed in a plastic cage, all anchored by a rubber outsole.

products.title: Zoom Kobe 6 GS 'All-Star - Sail'
products.description: The Nike Zoom Kobe 6 GS 'Sail', also known as 'All-Star 2.0', rolls out an off-white micromesh upper, covered in embossed stars in place of the traditional snakeskin-like texture. A contrasting black Swoosh graces the side panel, matching Kobe Bryant's shield logo on the tongue. A see-through heel counter offers ankle stability, while the lightweight Cushlon midsole has a Zoom Turbo forefoot unit for on-court responsiveness.

products.title: Wmns P-6000 'Metallic Silver Black'
products.description:
SKU: BV1021 013
Colorway: Metallic Silver/Black/White/Metallic Silver
Release Date: 10/1/25

products.title: Yeezy Desert Boot 'Oil' 2024
products.description: The 2024 iteration of the adidas Yeezy Desert Boot 'Oil' shoes bring an earth-toned upper, featuring open-cell mesh with matching nubuck and suede overlays. A padded high-cut collar helps keep you comfortable the minute you lace them up, while a rubber mudguard protects high-abrasion areas. These kicks have a lightweight foam midsole, anchored by a durable rubber outsole.

products.title: BAPE x Samba 'Black White Gum'
products.description: The BAPE x adidas Samba 'Black White Gum' brings a black leather upper updated with a rubberized T-toe overlay. A white BAPESTA logo decorates the right side of each shoe, while the opposite side is stamped with classic white leather three-stripes. Both brand logos land on the tongue tag and insoles. A gum rubber sole unit completes the look.
